page.description: Get a list of the media fields in a form definition.

argument.name: formId
argument.description: Form Id of the form definition

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: type
property.description: the type of media field (photo, audio, etc.)

property.name: path
property.description: the fully qualified field name (showing the full path to the field)

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "/GetFormMediaFieldNamesForFormId/value_of_formId" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
